items.summary: Update the Gold Paper navigation entry in the header so it no longer links (or redirects) to the canister URL `https://whu4t-kiaaa-aaaah-qsc5q-cai.icp0.io/` and instead routes internally to an on-site page (use the existing route `/gold-paper`). The Gold Paper nav item must be an internal SPA link (no `target="_blank"`, no external `<a href>` to the canister, no JavaScript redirect).

Replace the current `/gold-paper` page behavior so it does not perform any automatic redirect and does not expose or attempt to fetch any Gold Paper content. The `/gold-paper` page must display ONLY the following single line of text (English, exactly as provided): “Golden Paper temporarily unavailable – content preserved”.

Remove (or leave unused) any Gold Paper button/link implementation that routes users to the documentation canister root from the Gold Paper entry point(s), ensuring the frontend no longer causes IC0503/503 errors via the Gold Paper button.
